name: Cross Style
description:
"Trick! Slick! Stylish! "

Venture through the forest. Leap over misfortune. Spinout your skill with splendor.

Cross Style is an endless stylish runner game with the concept of challenging, witty, and quirky in mind. Personally picked from many concepts made in MojikenCamp 2022 with 2-days a game in mind. With guidance from Mojiken talents, we present everyone, a twist from classical. May your bike be steady.

Game Control:

→Right ArrowBoost↑ ↑
Double-tap Up ArrowJump↑ / ↓Up/Down ArrowSpin *CCW / CW* Counter Clock Wise / ClockWise

Credits:

Programming & ArtakirafujimaruMusicBackground Loop Melodic Techno #04 by Zen_Man The Future Bass by EvgenyBardyuzha
